languages.text: "С печалью сообщаю также, что Главный {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}технопровидец{/g}, пастырь и предводитель всех техножрецов корабля, пал в бою. Плоть, сколь мало бы ее ни оставалось в естестве магоса, подвела его. Потеря! Среди моих собратьев на борту нет никого, чей опыт и понимание священных протоколов сравнялись бы с почившим. Нам нужен преемник, и как можно скорее".

traits.locale_text: "С печалью сообщаю также, что достойнейший {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}магос{/g} Зета-Кси Пятый, {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Старший технопровидец{/g}, наставник и предводитель всех техножрецов корабля, пал в бою. Презренная плоть, сколь мало бы ее не оставалось в естестве магоса, подвела его. Потеря! Среди моих собратьев на борту нет никого, чей опыт и понимание священных протоколов сравнялись бы с почившим магосом. Нам нужен преемник, и как можно скорее".

languages.text: "With great sorrow I must also report that the {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} Prime, overseer and spiritual authority of all Tech-Priests on board, fell in battle. The Magos was betrayed by the little flesh that remained part of him. A most terrible loss! There is no one among my comrades aboard whose experience and comprehension of the sacred protocols equals that of the fallen Magos. We require a replacement, and as soon as possible."
languages.original_text: "С печалью сообщаю также, что Главный {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}технопровидец{/g}, пастырь и предводитель всех техножрецов корабля, пал в бою. Плоть, сколь мало бы ее ни оставалось в естестве магоса, подвела его. Потеря! Среди моих собратьев на борту нет никого, чей опыт и понимание священных протоколов сравнялись бы с почившим. Нам нужен преемник, и как можно скорее".

traits.locale_text: "With great sorrow I must also report that the {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Chief Enginseer{/g}, overseer and spiritual authority of all Tech-Priests on board, fell in battle. The Magos was betrayed by the little detestable flesh that remained part of him. A most terrible loss! There is no one among my comrades aboard whose experience and comprehension of the sacred protocols equals that of the fallen Magos. We require a replacement, and as soon as possible."

"With great sorrow I must also report that the {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} Prime, overseer and spiritual authority of all Tech-Priests on board, fell in battle. The Magos was betrayed by the little flesh that remained part of him. A most terrible loss! There is no one among my comrades aboard whose experience and comprehension of the sacred protocols equals that of the fallen Magos. We require a replacement, and as soon as possible."

"With great sorrow I must also report that the {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Chief Enginseer{/g}, overseer and spiritual authority of all Tech-Priests on board, fell in battle. The Magos was betrayed by the little detestable flesh that remained part of him. A most terrible loss! There is no one among my comrades aboard whose experience and comprehension of the sacred protocols equals that of the fallen Magos. We require a replacement, and as soon as possible."

"With great sorrow I must also report that the {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} Prime, overseer and spiritual authority of all Tech-Priests on board, fell in battle. The Magos was betrayed by the little detestable flesh that remained part of him. A most terrible loss! There is no one among my comrades aboard whose experience and comprehension of the sacred protocols equals that of the fallen Magos. We require a replacement, and as soon as possible."

"With great sorrow I must also report that the {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} Prime, overseer and spiritual authority of all Tech-Priests on board, fell in battle. The Magos was betrayed by the little flesh that remained part of him. A most terrible loss! There is no one among my comrades aboard whose experience and comprehension of the sacred protocols equals that of the fallen Magos. We require a replacement, and as soon as possible."

"With great sorrow I must also report that the {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} Prime, overseer and spiritual authority of all Tech-Priests on board, fell in battle. The Magos was betrayed by the little flesh that remained part of him. A most terrible loss! There is no one among my comrades aboard whose experience and comprehension of the sacred protocols equals that of the fallen Magos. We require a replacement, and as soon as possible."

languages.text: “请允许我怀着无比的悲痛向您报告，我们的主{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}引擎先知{/g}，船上所有技术神甫的管理者，以及精神方面的导师，在战斗中牺牲了。我们伟大的贤者，被他身上残留的肉体出卖了。这真是个无比可怕的损失！在我所有的伙伴中，无论是经验，还是对神圣协议的理解能力，都没有人能与那位牺牲的贤者相提并论。我们需要另一个人替代他，这个职位必须尽快安排。”
languages.original_text: "With great sorrow I must also report that the {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} Prime, overseer and spiritual authority of all Tech-Priests on board, fell in battle. The Magos was betrayed by the little flesh that remained part of him. A most terrible loss! There is no one among my comrades aboard whose experience and comprehension of the sacred protocols equals that of the fallen Magos. We require a replacement, and as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: “请允许我怀着无比的悲痛向您报告，我们的{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}首席引擎先知{/g}，船上所有技术祭司的管理者，以及精神方面的导师，在战斗中牺牲了。我们伟大的贤者，被他身上残留的那一点点脆弱的肉体出卖了。这真是个无比可怕的损失！在我所有的伙伴中，无论是经验，还是对神圣协议的理解能力，都没有人能与那位牺牲的贤者相提并论。我们需要另一个人替代他，这个职位必须尽快安排。”

languages.text: 「大きな悲しみをもって、私はまた、船上のすべての技術司祭の監督者であり精神的権威である{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}機関整備師{/g}長が戦死したことを報告しなければなりません。マゴスは、わずかに残った肉体に裏切られたのです。最も恐ろしい損失といえるでしょう！私の同志の中で、倒れたマゴスに匹敵する神聖なプロトコルの経験と理解力を持つ者はいません。一刻も早く、後任が必要です」
languages.original_text: "With great sorrow I must also report that the {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} Prime, overseer and spiritual authority of all Tech-Priests on board, fell in battle. The Magos was betrayed by the little flesh that remained part of him. A most terrible loss! There is no one among my comrades aboard whose experience and comprehension of the sacred protocols equals that of the fallen Magos. We require a replacement, and as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: 「大きな悲しみをもって、私はまた、船上のすべての技術司祭の監督者であり精神的権威である{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}機関整備師{/g}長が戦死したことを報告しなければなりません。マゴスは、わずかに残った憎むべき肉体に裏切られたのです。最も恐ろしい損失といえるでしょう！私の同志の中で、倒れたマゴスに匹敵する神聖なプロトコルの経験と理解力を持つ者はいません。一刻も早く、後任が必要です」

languages.text: "Mit großer Trauer muss ich zudem berichten, dass der {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Maschinenseher{/g} Primus, Oberhaupt und spirituelle Autorität aller Techpriester an Bord, in der Schlacht gefallen ist. Der Magos wurde durch das wenige Fleisch verraten, das noch Teil von ihm war. Ein schrecklicher Verlust! Niemand von meinen Kameraden an Bord verfügt über die Erfahrung und das Verständnis der heiligen Protokolle, wie der gefallene Magos sie aufwies. Wir brauchen Ersatz, und zwar so schnell wie möglich."
languages.original_text: "With great sorrow I must also report that the {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} Prime, overseer and spiritual authority of all Tech-Priests on board, fell in battle. The Magos was betrayed by the little flesh that remained part of him. A most terrible loss! There is no one among my comrades aboard whose experience and comprehension of the sacred protocols equals that of the fallen Magos. We require a replacement, and as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: "Mit großer Trauer muss ich zudem berichten, dass der {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}oberste Maschinenseher{/g}, Oberhaupt und spirituelle Autorität aller Techpriester an Bord, in der Schlacht gefallen ist. Der Magos wurde durch das wenige verabscheuungswürdige Fleisch verraten, das noch Teil von ihm war. Ein ganz furchtbarer Verlust! Niemand von meinen Kameraden an Bord verfügt über die Erfahrung und das Verständnis der heiligen Protokolle, wie der gefallene Magos sie aufwies. Wir brauchen Ersatz, und zwar so schnell wie möglich."

languages.text: « C'est avec une grande tristesse que je dois également vous annoncer la mort du {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}technaugure{/g} primus, autorité spirituelle et superviseur de tous les technoprêtres du bord. Le magos a été trahi par la portion congrue de chair qui restait en lui. Une immense perte ! Personne parmi mes confrères à bord ne dispose d'une expertise et d'une compréhension des protocoles sacrés à la hauteur de celles du défunt magos. Nous avons besoin d'un remplacement, et cela, dans les plus brefs délais. »
languages.original_text: "With great sorrow I must also report that the {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} Prime, overseer and spiritual authority of all Tech-Priests on board, fell in battle. The Magos was betrayed by the little flesh that remained part of him. A most terrible loss! There is no one among my comrades aboard whose experience and comprehension of the sacred protocols equals that of the fallen Magos. We require a replacement, and as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: « C'est avec une grande tristesse que je dois également vous annoncer la mort du {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}technaugure en chef{/g}, autorité spirituelle et superviseur de tous les technoprêtres du bord. Le magos a été trahi par la portion congrue d'ignoble chair qui restait en lui. Une immense perte ! Personne parmi mes confrères à bord ne dispose d'une expertise et d'une compréhension des protocoles sacrés à la hauteur de celles du défunt magos. Nous avons besoin d'un remplacement, et cela, dans les plus brefs délais. »

languages.text: «Con gran pesar, también debo comunicar que el {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}visioingeniero primero{/g}, supervisor y autoridad espiritual de todos los tecnosacerdotes a bordo, cayó en combate. La escasa carne que le quedaba traicionó al magos. ¡Es una pérdida trágica! Ninguno de mis camaradas en la nave cuenta con una experiencia y comprensión de los protocolos sagrados comparable a las del magos caído. Necesitamos un sustituto lo antes posible».
languages.original_text: "With great sorrow I must also report that the {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} Prime, overseer and spiritual authority of all Tech-Priests on board, fell in battle. The Magos was betrayed by the little flesh that remained part of him. A most terrible loss! There is no one among my comrades aboard whose experience and comprehension of the sacred protocols equals that of the fallen Magos. We require a replacement, and as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: «Con gran pesar, también debo comunicar que el {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}visioingeniero jefe{/g}, supervisor y autoridad espiritual de todos los tecnosacerdotes a bordo, cayó en combate. La escasa, pérfida carne que le quedaba traicionó al Magos. ¡Es una pérdida trágica! Ninguno de mis camaradas en la nave cuenta con una experiencia y comprensión de los protocolos sagrados comparable a las del Magos caído. Necesitamos un sustituto lo antes posible».

languages.text: "Gemideki tüm Tekno Rahiplerin gözetmeni ve ruhani önderi {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Başmühedyum'un{/g} muharebede şehit düştüğünü de büyük bir hüzünle bilginize sunarım. Magos, küçük de olsa bir parçası olarak kalan etinin ihanetine uğradı. Korkunç bir kayıp! Gemideki yoldaşlarım arasında, kutsal protokol deneyimi ve idraki, merhum Magos'unkine denk kimse yok. Bir an önce yeni bir Magos ikame etmeliyiz."
languages.original_text: "With great sorrow I must also report that the {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} Prime, overseer and spiritual authority of all Tech-Priests on board, fell in battle. The Magos was betrayed by the little flesh that remained part of him. A most terrible loss! There is no one among my comrades aboard whose experience and comprehension of the sacred protocols equals that of the fallen Magos. We require a replacement, and as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: "Gemideki tüm Tekno Rahiplerin gözetmeni ve ruhani önderi {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Başmühedyum'un{/g} muharebede şehit düştüğünü de büyük bir hüzünle bilginize sunarım. Magos, küçük de olsa bir parçası olarak kalan etinin ihanetine uğradı. Korkunç bir kayıp! Gemideki yoldaşlarım arasında, kutsal protokol deneyimi ve idraki, merhum Magos'unkine denk kimse yok. Bir an önce yeni bir Magos ikame etmeliyiz."
